amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 as en bloc No. 5: Nos. 134, 137, 145, 146, 149, 150, 154, 157, 162, 166, 173, 174, 179, 183, 184, 185, 186, 188, 189, and 191.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendments (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A050) offered by Ms. McCollum.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendments (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
